posts.post_content:
Hey, guys look!  
It's [Culling Sun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Culling Sun), but with an easier color commitment and lower CMC!  
Awesome!  
  
What's this?  
Oh ho!  
It prevents regeneration too?  
Sweetness!  
  
What ho?  
And at instant speed?  
Ye gods!

posts.post_content:
An answer for [Scute Mob](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Scute Mob).  
  
Used this in the pre-release today to great effect. Not as much against weenie decks, but to clear out their defenders before attacking with an Eldrazi. While it usually would clear out my own board of my mana accel, that wasn't a problem since when I used it I already had the eldrazi out. Hitting with the Annihilator afterwards usually killed them.

Posted By: spectermonger (4/17/2010 7:54:01 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Singlehandedly saved my backside - twice - against cheap flyers at the prerelease. Against a level-up-heavy deck, it's a near-complete board-wipe no matter how far they've leveled - exactly 2 out of the 25 creatures with level-up have converted mana cost greater than 3. I love this card.
